## üß© Module License {.unnumbered}

RAISINS is built **by researchers, for researchers** - a platform developed by a team of PhD scholars in Statistics who understand the real needs of the academic community.\
Our plans are thoughtfully designed to support **students and early-career researchers** in accessing quality statistical tools without financial burden.

To make it simple and flexible, **each RAISINS app functions as an independent module.**

::: info-card
<h4>üí° Just ‚Çπ199 per month</h4>

<p>You can subscribe only to the tools you need, starting at <strong>just ‚Çπ199</strong> per month and there‚Äôs no requirement to renew if you don‚Äôt need it in the next month.</p>

<p style="font-size:0.9rem; color:#555;">

Currently, no usage limits are enforced. If you ever reach one (rarely), just drop us an email we‚Äôll unlock it for you.

</p>
:::

Simply click on any app listed under [Analysis Modules](index.qmd#analysis) and choose a **monthly or 6-month license**.\
This modular subscription is perfect for students and researchers who need specific tools for a limited period.

::: tip-card
<h4>üîç Preview any app for free</h4>

<p>Before subscribing, you can explore all RAISINS modules in <strong>preview mode</strong> using our built-in sample datasets. It‚Äôs the best way to experience RAISINS before committing.</p>

<p><a href="https://www.raisins.live/tutorial/Intro/raisinsIntro.html#gettingStarted" target="_blank">View Tutorial ‚Üí</a></p>
:::

## üè´ Institutional License {#sec-inst}

We also offer comprehensive **Institutional Licenses** to support collaborative research and academic teaching. These plans provide **Access to all RAISINS apps** for a fixed number of users within a department, college, or university. Whether you're supervising a small team or managing a large institution, there‚Äôs a plan designed to fit your scale and scope.

> *Institutional licenses are ideal for teaching labs, research projects, and campus-wide adoption of RAISINS.*
